mapper.select: select DISTINCT tripDate from planDetail where tno = #{tno}

select p.pno, p.tno, p.tripDate, p.no, p.planComment, ti.place, ti.imageFile, tc.cate_name from planDetail p, tripPlan t, tripInfo ti, tripInfoCategory tc where p.tno = #{tno} and p.tripDate = #{tripDate} and p.tno = t.tno and p.no = ti.no and ti.cate_code1 = tc.cate_code1 and p.tripDate between t.tripStartDate and t.tripEndDate order by p.tripTime, p.pno

select p.pno, p.tripDate, p.no, to_char(p.tripTime, 'HH24:MI') tripTime, p.planComment, ct.cityNum, ti.place, ti.imageFile, tc.cate_name from planDetail p, tripPlan t, city ct, tripInfo ti, tripInfoCategory tc where p.tno = #{tno} and p.pno = #{pno} and p.tno = t.tno and p.no = ti.no and ct.cityNum = ti.cityNum and ti.cate_code1 = tc.cate_code1 and p.tripDate between t.tripStartDate and t.tripEndDate
mapper.delete: delete from planDetail where pno = #{pno} and tno = #{tno}
